title: I Quiver in my Calvins
description: “I QUIVER IN MY CALVINS is an ode to decay. It sings of rotten avocados, dead rabbits, cavities, illness -- a filament of little destructions. Esther Veitch is a master of describing gentle pain, and her poems have a way of making you feel tender: softened, but exposed.”
author: Esther Veitch
